  Learn More](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/726/Weather-Center)

  Learn More](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/124/City-Elections)

1. News & Calendar
   ===============
2. Stay up to date with the latest news and events.

1. [![](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=25491)](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/933/Cease-the-Grease)

   #### [Cease the Grease](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/933/Cease-the-Grease)

   Learn how to properly dispose of fats, oils, and grease (FOG) and help protect our community. [Learn more...](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/933/Cease-the-Grease)
2. [![Soulfreak Ribbon Cutting](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=25468)](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1066)

   #### [PRESS RELEASE](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1066)

   The Seabrook Economic Development Corporation (SEDC), alongside City leaders and community members, proudly celebrated the grand opening of Soulfreak ... [Read on...](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1066)
3. [![2026 Election Information](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=25545)](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/124/City-Elections)

   #### [2026 Election Information](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/124/City-Elections)

   The City of Seabrook will hold a General Election on Saturday, May 2, 2026. [Additional Info...](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/124/City-Elections)
4. [![](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=25531)](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1075)

   #### [Business of the Year](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1075)

   The City of Seabrook is proud to announce Seabrook Cheese Company as the 2025 Seabrook Business of the Year. [Read on...](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1075)
5. [![](/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=25490)](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/932/How-To-Guide)

   #### [How To Guide](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/932/How-To-Guide)

   Learn how to easily navigate the City's online document library with a video tutorial and step-by-step guide. [Learn how...](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/932/How-To-Guide)

/QuickLinks.aspx

1. ### ADOPTED 2023-2024 TAX RATE

   THE CITY OF SEABROOK ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISE BY 2.50 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $-4.38. [Learn more about the City of Seabrook's budget and financials.](http://seabrooktx.gov/184/Financial-Transparency)

1. [Notice About 2024 Tax Rates](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/20279/Notice-About-2024-Tax-Rates)

1. [Notice of Public Hearing - 2024 Tax Rate](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/20277/Notice-of-Public-Hearing-2024-Taxes)

SeabrookAlerts

[![Seabrook Alerts Opens in new window](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=20578)](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/285/Seabrook-Alerts)

SeabrookAlerts is the official emergency alert and notification system for the City of Seabrook. It is a free service that sends timely and reliable information to the public during emergencies.

[Click here to sign up today.](http://www.seabrooktx.gov/285/Seabrook-Alerts)
